messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: unschooling ? from people
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/4/2006 11:32:58 P.M. Eastern Standard Time, mfhickman@comcast.net writes: We often  get asked schoolish things when out and about, like
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/4/2006 11:32:58 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,
mfhickman@... writes:

We often get asked schoolish things when out and about, like are you out of
school today. My favor answer is, "we homeschool, and we are learning from
you today". It starts up lively conversations, at the dentist, the store, the
tire repair place, whereever. People get into the joy of learning right along
side us.

Mary



***********

Mary, this is such a sweet answer.

I will be thinking of times when this is a good thing to say.

Leslie in SC


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: unschooling ? from people
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, We often get asked schoolish things when out and about, like are you out of school today. My favor answer is, we homeschool,  and we are learning from you
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

We often get asked schoolish things when out and about, like are you out of school today. My favor answer is, "we homeschool, and we are learning from you today". It starts up lively conversations, at the dentist, the store, the tire repair place, whereever. People get into the joy of learning right along side us.

Mary

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
